input-field.name: ignoredev
input-field.label: Do not trigger if the environment is not running in production mode

input-field.name: mentions
input-field.label: Mentions
input-field.helpText: You can specify multiple mentions separated by semicolon (;). Please use @USERID or !here

input-field.name: errorsenabled
input-field.label: Log errors too
input-field.helpText: Can be unselected to hide errors from the Slack feed

input-field.name: ignorederrors
input-field.label: Ignored error classes
input-field.helpText: You can list the Error Classes to ignore in this field, one per line. We use instanceof logic, so interitance works

input-field.name: ignoredreferererrors
input-field.label: Ignored error classes where referer is empty
input-field.helpText: You can list the Error Classes to ignore in this field, one per line. We use instanceof logic, so interitance works. These errors are ignored when the referer is empty. For example, you can still detect invalid URLs coming in, but ignore when users/bots opened them directly

input-field.name: ignoredreferers
input-field.label: Ignored referer regexes
input-field.helpText: Please put one regex per line, referers matching regex will be ignored. Regexes are treated case insensitive

input-field.name: ignoredbots
input-field.label: Ignored bot regexes
input-field.helpText: Please put one regex per line, bots matching regex will be ignored. Regexes are treated case insensitive
